original_text: The Lord says, ‘I will blow you away, as a hot desert wind blows away straw. The Lord says, ‘I will blow you away, as a hot desert wind blows away straw. The Lord says, ‘I will blow you away, as a hot desert wind blows away straw. The Lord says,
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 그들을 사막 바람에 불려가는 검불 같이 흩으리로다

sentences.original_text: as a hot desert wind blows away straw
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 뜨거운 광야의 바람이 짚을 날려 보내는 것처럼
